attributes.action: To Ban the following groups because of their inherent racism towards white people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These groups ban white people from joining. Why is it, they try to ban the BNP, NF, the only two groups openly white in the UK, when all of the "other" groups are allowed to operate. BLATANT DISCRIMINATION. THEY SHOULD BE BANNED.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
